NOTE : The identity of the species treated by Knoz & Chubareva ( 1974 ) and Chubareva & Petrova ( 1979, 1984 , 2003, 2008 a) as
S. austeni
and/or
S. posticatum
is uncertain, but it is not
S. posticatum
or any other examined member of the
S. venustum
group.

Simulium
‘EFG
venustum
’ Rothfels, Feraday & Kaneps

NOTE : Although Rothfels ( 1979 ) tentatively identified this species as
S. morsitans
, its banding pattern does not match that of
bona fide S. morsitans
, which does not carry the IIS EFG sequence (Adler, unpublished).
